title.rendered: How Much Does It Cost to Build a Website in Pune? (The Answer may Surprise you!)

content.rendered:
Looking to build a website for your business in Pune? If yes, you must be wondering about the website design and development costs in Pune. 

The cost of website development in Pune depends on various factors, including the type of website, number of pages, complexity of design and much more. 

In this blog, we will delve into various factors determining the cost of website design and development in Pune, Maharashtra.

Website Development Costs In Pune For Different Websites

Types Of Website

Website Development Cost

Small Business Website

₹ 80,000 – ₹ 1,50,000 

Static Website

₹ 10,000 –   ₹30,000

Dynamic Website

₹ 50,000 – ₹ 1,00,000 

E-commerce Website

₹ 1,50,000 – ₹ 4,00,000 

Custom Website

₹ 2,00,000 – ₹ 6,00,000 

Website Development Costs Based on Website Type

  • Static Website: This type of website is Ideal for small businesses and personal portfolios. A static website typically consists of a few pages without dynamic features. The cost for a basic static website in Pune can range from ₹10,000 to ₹30,000.

 

  • Dynamic Website: This type of website is Suitable for businesses requiring frequent updates and interaction, dynamic websites are more complex and thus more expensive, ranging from ₹30,000 to ₹1,00,000.

 

  • E-commerce Website: For online stores, e-commerce websites involve extensive functionalities like payment gateways, product listings, and customer management systems. These can cost anywhere between ₹50,000 to ₹2,50,000.

 

  • Web Applications:- Custom web applications are ideal for businesses with specific needs, such as user portals, custom databases, and integrations with external services. In Pune, developing custom web applications typically costs between ₹1,00,000 to ₹5,00,000 or more. Costs vary based on the complexity of features like user management, real-time data processing, and integration with external systems.

Website Cost Calculator

Easily calculate the cost of your Business website or eCommerce website with us. Get a free on-demand quotation on your next big idea.

Get Free Online Consultation Now!!

Website Cost Calculator

Website Development Costs Based on Number of pages

  • Small Website:- A basic website with up to 5 essential pages like Home, About Us, Services, and Contact typically costs between ₹15,000 to ₹50,000. This price range covers basic design and functionality.

 

  • Medium to Large Websites: Websites with a moderate number of pages (10-20 pages) for businesses needing more comprehensive content and features range from ₹50,000 to ₹1,00,000. This cost includes additional features like image galleries, blogs, or customer portals.

 

  • eCommerce Products:– eCommerce website with minimum 50 Products typically costs between ₹80,000 to ₹1,50,000. This includes social integrations, payment gateway and chat Integrations.

Website Development Costs Based on Team Size

When planning a website development project, the type of team you choose significantly impacts the cost. Here’s a detailed comparison based on a project requiring 1,000 hours of development time:



Team Type 

Development Cost 

In-house Team

₹50,00,000 Approx.

Local Agency

₹1,50,000 Approx.

Freelancers

₹1,00,000 Approx.




While cost is a crucial factor, remember that quality, scalability, and security should be prioritized. Let’s explore the various team options in detail:

1. Build an In-House Team

Hiring an in-house team involves considerable investment but offers certain benefits:

Annual Cost: Approximately ₹50,00,000 (including salaries, taxes, accounting costs, office expenses, and maintenance).

Pros:

  • Deep understanding of your business and goals.
  • Immediate availability when needed.

Cons:

  • Expensive to maintain.
  • Key-person risk and limited expertise.
  • Potential lack of resources.

2. Hire a Local Website Development Agency

Local agencies like Codevian Technologies provide expertise and quality while offering budget-friendly options. :

Design and Development: ₹50,000 to ₹2,50,000.

Annual Maintenance: Up to ₹20,000.

Marketing: Up to ₹30,000.

Pros:

  • High level of expertise and no communication gap.
  • Efficient product delivery and easy to hire.
  • Expertise, proficiency, and cost-effectiveness.
  • Seamless communication and dedicated team members
  • Personalized services to understand your needs well. 

Cons:

  • Low Availability

3. Hire a Freelancer or a Freelance Team

Freelancers offer cost-effective solutions, ideal for smaller budgets:

Total Cost: Around ₹5,000 to ₹10,000 per page (including developer and designer fees).

Pros:

  • Cost-effective with dedicated team members.
  • Seamless communication and tech-agnostic development.

Cons:

  • Reliability and communication issues.
  • No guarantee of project completion.

Build your Dream Website with Codevian Technologies

Are you ready to turn your website vision into reality? Look no further than Codevian Technologies! We’re your one-stop shop for all things website development.

 

Our skilled team offers a comprehensive range of services — from crafting stunning website designs that capture attention to developing user-friendly functionalities that keep visitors engaged. Whether you need a stylish e-commerce platform to showcase your products or a dynamic company website to establish your brand, we’ve got you covered.

 

The main benefit of working with us is that we give personal attention to understanding your needs and goals,  ensuring your website not only looks amazing but also effectively achieves your objectives.  

 

Contact us to learn more about the full spectrum of services we offer and get started on building your dream website today! You can also check our offerings below: 

Hire web Developer in Pune

Conclusion

In Pune, the cost of website development varies depending on the type and complexity of the site. A small business website can cost between ₹80,000 and ₹1,50,000, while a custom site can range from ₹2,00,000 to ₹6,00,000. Additional costs include design, maintenance, and marketing. Choosing between in-house teams, local agencies, or freelancers will also affect your expenses. Despite the cost, prioritizing quality, scalability, and security is important for a successful website — So choose Codevain as your website development partner 🙂
